query.statement:
SELECT ROUND(T.ACTIVE_X ,0) AS ACTIVE_X ,ROUND(T.P1+T.P01+T.P001,0) AS P1 ,ROUND(T.P2+T.P02+T.P002,0) AS P2 ,ROUND(T.P3,0) AS P3 ,ROUND(T.P4,0) AS P4 ,ROUND(T.P5+T.P05+T.P005,0) AS P5 ,ROUND(T.P6+T.P06+T.P006,0) AS P6 ,ROUND(T.P7,0) AS P7 ,ROUND(T.P8,0) AS P8 ,ROUND(T.P9+T.P09+T.P009,0) AS P9 ,ROUND(T.P10+T.P010+T.P0010,0) AS P10 ,ROUND(T.P11,0) AS P11 ,ROUND(T.P12,0) AS P12 ,ROUND(T.P13+T.P013+T.P0013,0) AS P13 ,ROUND(T.P14+T.P014+T.P0014,0) AS P14 ,ROUND(T.P15,0) AS P15 ,ROUND(T.P16,0) AS P16 ,ROUND(T.P17+T.P017+T.P0017,0) AS P17 ,ROUND(T.P18+T.P018+T.P0018,0) AS P18 ,ROUND(T.P19,0) AS P19 ,ROUND(T.P20,0) AS P20 ,ROUND(T.P5+T.P05+T.P005+T.P9+T.P09+T.P009+T.P13+T.P013+T.P0013+T.P17+T.P017+T.P0017,0) AS P21 ,ROUND(T.P6+T.P06+T.P006+T.P10+T.P010+T.P0010+T.P14+T.P014+T.P0014+T.P18+T.P018+T.P0018,0) AS P22 ,ROUND(T.P23,0) AS P23 ,ROUND(T.P24,0) AS P24 ,CASE WHEN T.P5+T.P05+T.P005+T.P9+T.P09+T.P009+T.P13+T.P013+T.P0013+T.P17+T.P017+T.P0017 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((double(T.P6+T.P06+T.P006+T.P10+T.P010+T.P0010+T.P14+T.P014+T.P0014+T.P18+T.P018+T.P0018)/double(T.P5+T.P05+T.P005+T.P9+T.P09+T.P009+T.P13+T.P013+T.P0013+T.P17+T.P017+T.P0017 ))*100,0) END AS P25 ,CASE WHEN T.P26+T.P026+T.P0026 =0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(T.P26+T.P026+T.P0026,0) END AS P26 ,ROUND(T.P27+T.P027+T.P0027,0) AS P27 ,CASE WHEN T.P28 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(T.P28,0) END AS P28 ,ROUND(T.P29,0) AS P29 ,ROUND(T.P30+T.P030+T.P0030,0) AS P30 ,ROUND(ROUND((T.P2+T.P02+T.P002+T.P6+T.P06+T.P006+T.P10+T.P010+T.P0010+T.P14+T.P014+T.P0014+T.P18+T.P018+T.P0018),0)+((T.P27+T.P027+T.P0027)*0.9),0) AS P31
,ROUND(T.P33,0) AS P33 ,ROUND(T.P34,0) AS P34 ,ROUND((double((T.P2+T.P02+T.P002+T.P6+T.P06+T.P006+T.P10+T.P010+T.P0010+T.P14+T.P014+T.P0014+T.P18+T.P018+T.P0018)+((T.P27+T.P027+T.P0027)*0.9))/double(T.P30+T.P030+T.P0030))*100 ,0) AS P32
FROM ( SELECT VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'D' THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10,0) AS ACTIVE_X --½ÇÆÐ ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P1 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P01 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P001 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P2 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P02 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,4) THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P002 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'D' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P3 --P3 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,4) THEN GAP ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P4 --P4 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('01','02','03') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P5 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('01','02','03') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P05 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C'AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('01','02','03') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P005 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('01','02','03') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) ) /10 ,0) AS P6 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('01','02','03') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)) /10 ,0) AS P06 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('01','02','03') THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END) ) /10 ,0) AS P006 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'D' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('01','02','03') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P7 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('01','02','03') THEN GAP ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P8 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('04','05','06') THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P9 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('04','05','06') THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P09 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('04','05','06') THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P009 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('04','05','06') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)) /10 ,0) AS P10 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('04','05','06') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)) /10 ,0) AS P010 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('04','05','06') THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END)) /10 ,0) AS P0010 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'D' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('04','05','06') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P11 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('04','05','06') THEN GAP ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P12 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('07','08','09') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P13 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('07','08','09') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P013 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('07','08','09') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P0013 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('07','08','09') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) ) /10 ,0) AS P14 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('07','08','09') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) ) /10 ,0) AS P014 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('07','08','09') THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END)) /10 ,0) AS P0014 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'D' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('07','08','09') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P15 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('07','08','09') THEN GAP ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P16 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('10','11','12') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P17 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('10','11','12') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P017 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('10','11','12') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P0017 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('10','11','12') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) ) /10 ,0) AS P18 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('10','11','12') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)) /10 ,0) AS P018 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('10','11','12') THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END) ) /10 ,0) AS P0018 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'D' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('10','11','12') THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P19 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) AND SUBSTR(FDATE,5,2) IN ('10','11','12') THEN GAP ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P20
,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'D' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P23 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),1,4) THEN GAP ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P24 ,'' AS P25 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKE_NY#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P26 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKE_NY#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P026 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKE_NY#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P0026 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKE_NY#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) ) /10 ,0) AS P27 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKE_NY#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)) /10 ,0) AS P027 ,VALUE((SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKE_NY#,1,4) THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END) ) /10 ,0) AS P0027 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'D' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKE_NY#,1,4) THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P28 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' AND SUBSTR(FDATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#MAKE_NY#,1,4) THEN GAP ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P29 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'A' THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P30 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'B' THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P030 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END)/10 ,0) AS P0030 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'D' THEN PLANSUM ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P33 ,VALUE(SUM(CASE WHEN ACTIVE_R = 'C' THEN GAP ELSE 0 END) /10 ,0) AS P34
FROM SAPHEE.ZSDTW012 AS A WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID = #PSPID# AND MAKE_MM = ( SELECT X.MAKE_MM FROM SAPHEE.ZSDTW012 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.PSPID = A.PSPID ORDER BY X.MAKE_MM DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY )
)AS T
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
